thread.title: Anonymous
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Anonymous
text:
I found three very hard to find blue ceiling lamp globes. The pattern and color were not quite a match to the fixture but close enough to work. They fit well and shipping time was good. Price was a touch high.
PS: Great overall selection too.
Note: The name on the upper right of the review page is not mine. Glitch in TrustPilot. NOT dissatisfied.
